motto: 求知若饥,虚心若愚 (Stay hungry Stay foolish)
完成的比完美更好 (Done is better than perfect)
无风不起浪 (There is no smoke without fire)
预防为主，治疗为辅(An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure)
不要把鸡蛋都放在一个篮子(Don't put all your eggs in one basket)
种瓜得瓜,种豆得豆（As you sow,so shoul you reap)
欲速则不达（Great haste makes great waste)
天助自助者（God helps those who help themselves)
有志者事竟成（Where there is a will,there is a way)
人生如马,你不驭它,它便驭你（Life is a horse, and either you ride it or it rides you)
三思而后行( Look before you leap。Think first, Program later)
当你仅有的一把工具是锤子，所有的东西看起来都像是钉子（When the only tool you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail)
沉默就是赞同 （Silence is construed as approval)
双鸟在林不如一鸟在手（A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush)
能力越大责任越大（With great power comes great responsibility)
